title: Mondelez Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q3
text:
Investing.com - Mondelez (NASDAQ:MDLZ) reported third quarter earnings that beat analysts' expectations on Tuesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $0.64 on revenue of $6.36B. Analysts polled by Investing.com forecast EPS of $0.6 on revenue of $6.35B. That compared to EPS of $0.62 on revenue of $6.29B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $0.57 on revenue of $6.04B in the previous quarter.

Mondelez shares lost 0.04% to trade at $52.83 in after-hours trade following the report.





Mondelez follows other major Consumer/Non-Cyclical sector earnings this month

On October 22, Procter&Gamble reported first quarter EPS of $1.37 on revenue of $17.8B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $1.24 on revenue of $17.45B.

Coca-Cola earnings matched analysts' expectations on October 18, with third quarter EPS of $0.56 on revenue of $9.5B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $0.56 on revenue of $9.43B
